{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2503.24002v1", "title": "A Simple BER Expression for FSO Systems with Weak Turbulence and
  Pointing Errors", "summary": "We develop a simple approximation for the average BER for an FSO system
impacted by weak turbulence and pointing errors. Numerical results show that
the proposed expression accurately predicts the true BER.", "main_category": "eess.SP", "categories": "eess.SP", "published": "2025-03-31T12:27:24Z"}
